DOC.brief_summary: After three month weight loss phase involve use meal replacement , participant randomize different weight loss maintenance condition . Aim 1 : To test hypothesis meal replacement ( MR ) reduce energy density eat ( REDE ) intervention , add separately LEARN program , produce superior weight loss maintenance compare LEARN-only intervention . Aim 2 : To test hypothesis weight loss maintenance condition combine MRs REDE produce good maintenance weight loss either individual component LEARN-only condition . Aim 3 : To test hypothesis two condition receive REDE intervention experience longer-lasting improvement energy density nutritional composition diet compare two non-REDE condition .
DOC.criteria: BMI 30 , BMI 27 weightrelated comorbidities Access telephone voice mail/answering machine MUST see primary care physician work u study ( great Philadelphia area ) Previously/currently diagnose eat disorder Current bipolar , depression , substance abuse , dependence disorder Living someone already enrol Enrolled another weight loss program Current disorder/medications affect body weight energy expenditure ( e.g . thyroid disease ) Myocardial infraction within past three month Unstable angina Nephrotic syndrome/malabsorptive disease Gout attack within past year Lactating/pregnant ( plan within next two year ) Current/recent history cancer , neurological disease , high creatinine level , active hepatic disease
